title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct 1st and 2nd terms

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct interval for series

1 point is earned for making the correct connection

1 point is earned for the correct answer

The series for e u converges for −∞ < u < ∞

So the series for e -2 x 2 converges for −∞<−2 x 2 <∞ and thus, for −∞ < x < ∞

or

1 point is earned for correctly setting up the ratio

1 point is earned for correctly computing the limit

lim n→∞ | a n+1 a n |= lim n→∞ | (−1) n+1 2 n+1 x 2(n+1) (n+1)! ⋅ n! (−1) n 2 n x 2n |                           = lim n→∞ 2 n+1 x 2 =0<1

1 point is earned for the correct answer

So the series for e -2 x 2 converges for −∞ < x < ∞

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for correctly alternating series bound of 16 x 8 4! MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaaca aIXaGaaGOnaiaadIhadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaiIdaaaaakeaacaaI0aGa aiyiaaaaaaa@3ADA@

f(x)−g(x)= 16 x 8 4! − 32 x 16 5! +⋯

1 point is earned for correctly using x = 0.6

This is an alternating series for each x, since powers of x are even.

Also, | a n +1 a n |= 2 n+1 x 2 <1 for −0.6≤x≤0.6 so terms are decreasing in absolute value

1 point is used for the correct conclusion
